Job Description: Software Development Test Engineer     Job Qualifications:      Expertise in Developing, Managing, and implementing core features in Automation Framework using Selenium& TestNG.   4-6 years of experience   Work closely with the Developers and Engineers to achieve a high level of code coverage   You create the necessary automation library and framework.
